trans-unit.source: The WebSocket class allows applications to send and receive data after the WebSocket upgrade has completed.
trans-unit.target: WebSocket 類別允許應用程式在 WebSocket 升級完成之後傳送和接收資料。

trans-unit.source: Some of the classes in the <xref:System.Net.WebSockets> namespace are supported on Windows 7, Windows Vista SP2, and Windows Server 2008.
trans-unit.target: 部分類別中<xref:System.Net.WebSockets>Windows 7、 Windows Vista SP2 和 Windows Server 2008 上支援命名空間。

trans-unit.source: However, the only public implementations of client and server WebSockets are supported on Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012.
trans-unit.target: 不過，在 Windows 8 和 Windows Server 2012 上支援的用戶端和伺服器 WebSockets 的只有公用實作。

trans-unit.source: The classes and class elements in the <xref:System.Net.WebSockets> namespace that are supported on Windows 7, Windows Vista SP2, and Windows Server 2008 are abstract classes.
trans-unit.target: 類別和類別中的項目<xref:System.Net.WebSockets>Windows 7、 Windows Vista SP2 和 Windows Server 2008 支援的命名空間是抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: This allows an application developer to inherit and extend these abstract classes with an actual implementation of client WebSockets.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓應用程式開發人員，以繼承並擴充用戶端 WebSockets 的實際實作這些抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Aborts the WebSocket connection and cancels any pending IO operations.
trans-unit.target: 中止 WebSocket 連接，並取消任何暫止的 IO 作業。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the reason for closing the WebSocket connection.
trans-unit.target: 表示關閉 WebSocket 連接的原因。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a human readable explanation as to why the connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: 指定人類看得懂的說明，解釋為何關閉連線。

trans-unit.source: The token that can be used to propagate notification that operations should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 可用來傳播應該取消作業之通知的語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Closes the WebSocket connection as an asynchronous operation using the close handshake defined in the [WebSocket protocol specification](http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-hybi-thewebsocketprotocol-06) section 7.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步作業使用 [WebSocket 通訊協定規格](http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-hybi-thewebsocketprotocol-06)第 7 節中所定義的關閉信號交換，關閉 WebSocket 連接。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />。

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: This operation will not block.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業不會封鎖。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> object will complete after the WebSocket has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>WebSocket 關閉之後，物件會完成。

trans-unit.source: This method closes the WebSocket connection using the close handshake defined in the [WebSocket protocol specification](http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-hybi-thewebsocketprotocol-06) section 7.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會關閉 WebSocket 連接使用中定義的關閉交握[WebSocket 通訊協定規格](http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-hybi-thewebsocketprotocol-06)第 7 節。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the reason for closing the WebSocket connection.
trans-unit.target: 表示關閉 WebSocket 連接的原因。

trans-unit.source: Allows applications to specify a human readable explanation as to why the connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: 可讓應用程式指定人類看得懂的說明，解釋為何關閉連線。

trans-unit.source: The token that can be used to propagate notification that operations should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 可用來傳播應該取消作業之通知的語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Initiates or completes the close handshake defined in the [WebSocket protocol specification section 7](http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-hybi-thewebsocketprotocol-06).
trans-unit.target: 啟始或完成 [WebSocket 通訊協定規格第 7 節](http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-hybi-thewebsocketprotocol-06)中定義的關閉信號交換。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />。

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: This operation will not block.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業不會封鎖。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> object will complete after the output on the WebSocket has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>關閉 WebSocket 上的輸出之後，物件會完成。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the reason why the remote endpoint initiated the close handshake.
trans-unit.target: 表示遠端端點已起始關閉訊號交換的原因。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus" />。

trans-unit.source: If the close handshake has not been initiated yet, WebSocketCloseStatus.None is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果未起始關閉訊號交換，則會傳回 WebSocketCloseStatus.None。

trans-unit.source: Allows the remote endpoint to describe the reason why the connection was closed.
trans-unit.target: 允許遠端端點描述此連接關閉的原因。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The size, in bytes, of the client receive buffer.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端接收緩衝區的大小 (以位元組為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The size, in bytes, of the send buffer.
trans-unit.target: 傳送緩衝區大小，以位元組為單位。

trans-unit.source: Create client buffers to use with this <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 建立要與這個 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" /> 執行個體搭配使用的用戶端緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.ArraySegment`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.ArraySegment`1" />。

trans-unit.source: An array with the client buffers.
trans-unit.target: 具有用戶端緩衝區的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The connection to be used for IO operations.
trans-unit.target: 要用於 IO 作業的連接。

trans-unit.source: The subprotocol accepted by the client.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端所接受的附屬通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: The size in bytes of the client WebSocket receive buffer.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端 WebSocket 接收緩衝區的大小 (以位元組為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The size in bytes of the client WebSocket send buffer.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端 WebSocket 傳送緩衝區的大小 (以位元組為單位)。

trans-unit.source: Determines how regularly a frame is sent over the connection as a keep-alive.
trans-unit.target: 決定如何定期在連線上傳送保持連接的框架。

trans-unit.source: Applies only when the connection is idle.
trans-unit.target: 僅適用於連線處於閒置狀態時。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a random key or a static key (just zeros) should be used for the WebSocket masking.
trans-unit.target: 表示隨機金鑰或靜態金鑰 (只是零) 是否應用於 WebSocket 遮罩。

trans-unit.source: Will be used as the internal buffer in the WPC.
trans-unit.target: 做為 WPC 中的內部緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The size has to be at least <c>2 * ReceiveBufferSize + SendBufferSize + 256 + 20 (16 on 32-bit)</c>.
trans-unit.target: 大小必須至少為 <c>2 * ReceiveBufferSize + SendBufferSize + 256 + 20 (32 位元時為 16)</c>。

trans-unit.source: This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 支援 .NET Framework 基礎結構，並不適合直接從您的程式碼中使用。

trans-unit.source: Allows callers to create a client side WebSocket class which will use the WSPC for framing purposes.
trans-unit.target: 允許呼叫端建立使用 WSPC 進行框架處理的用戶端 WebSocket 類別。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" />。

trans-unit.source: The size, in bytes, of the desired buffer.
trans-unit.target: 所需緩衝區的大小 (以位元組為單位)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a WebSocket server buffer.
trans-unit.target: 建立 WebSocket 伺服器緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.ArraySegment`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.ArraySegment`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default WebSocket protocol keep-alive interval in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 取得預設 WebSocket 通訊協定保持連接間隔，以毫秒為單位。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />。

trans-unit.source: The default WebSocket protocol keep-alive interval in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 預設 WebSocket 通訊協定保持連接間隔，以毫秒為單位。

trans-unit.source: The typical value for this interval is 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 這個間隔的一般值為 30 秒。

trans-unit.source: Used to clean up unmanaged resources for ASP.NET and self-hosted implementations.
trans-unit.target: 用來清除 Unmanaged 資源，適用於 ASP.NET 和自我裝載的實作。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates if the WebSocket instance is targeting [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 傳回表示 WebSocket 執行個體是否以 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 為目標的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" /> is targeting [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" /> 是以 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 為目標，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The current state of the WebSocket.
trans-unit.target: WebSocket 的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates if the state of the WebSocket instance is closed or aborted.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出 WebSocket 執行個體的狀態是關閉或中止。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" /> is closed or aborted; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" /> 已關閉或已中止則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: References the application buffer that is the storage location for the received data.
trans-unit.target: 參考為已接收資料之儲存體位置的應用程式緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: Propagates the notification that operations should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 散佈通知，表示應該取消作業。

trans-unit.source: Receives data from the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" /> connection asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式從 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" /> 連接接收資料。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> property on the task object returns a <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array containing the received data.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件上的 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> 屬性傳回包含已接收資料的 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列。

trans-unit.source: This operation will not block.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業不會封鎖。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object will complete after the data has been received on the <xref:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>物件上接收資料後，會完成<xref:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket>。

trans-unit.source: Exactly one send and one receive is supported on each <xref:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket> object in parallel.
trans-unit.target: 只有一個傳送，另一個接收的每個支援<xref:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket>平行物件。

trans-unit.source: This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 支援 .NET Framework 基礎結構，並不適合直接從您的程式碼中使用。

trans-unit.source: Allows callers to register prefixes for WebSocket requests (ws and wss).
trans-unit.target: 允許呼叫端註冊 WebSocket 要求 (ws 和 wss) 的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The buffer to be sent over the connection.
trans-unit.target: 要透過連線傳送的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the application is sending a binary or text message.
trans-unit.target: 指出應用程式是否正在傳送二進位或文字訊息。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the data in "buffer" is the last part of a message.
trans-unit.target: 指出「緩衝區」中的資料是否為訊息的最後一部分。

trans-unit.source: The token that propagates the notification that operations should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 傳播應該取消作業之通知的語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Sends data over the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" /> connection asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步的方式透過 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket" /> 連線傳送資料。

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: This operation will not block.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業不會封鎖。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> object will complete after the data has been sent on the <xref:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>物件傳送資料之後，會完成<xref:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket>。

trans-unit.source: Exactly one send and one receive is supported on each <xref:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket> object in parallel.
trans-unit.target: 只有一個傳送，另一個接收的每個支援<xref:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket>平行物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current state of the WebSocket connection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 WebSocket 連線的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketState" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketState" />。

trans-unit.source: The subprotocol that was negotiated during the opening handshake.
trans-unit.target: 開始信號交換期間所交涉的子通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The current state of the WebSocket to be tested against the list of valid states.
trans-unit.target: 要根據有效狀態清單測試的 WebSocket 目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: List of valid connection states.
trans-unit.target: 有效連接狀態的清單。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the connection is in an expected state.
trans-unit.target: 確認連接處於預期的狀態。
